thread.title: Ocean Beach fires soon to need more than a match — a permit, too
thread.title_full: Ocean Beach fires soon to need more than a match — a permit, too - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Lizzie Johnson
title: Ocean Beach fires soon to need more than a match — a permit, too
text:
Photo: Franchon Smith, The Chronicle Hanging out at Ocean Beach enjoying their campfire and the mild weather, left to right, Academy of Art students Ren Kaws, 21, Rosemary Xue, 21, Lisa Wang, 20, Stella Yang, 19, and Daniel Chang 19 on October 18, 2015. Hanging out at Ocean Beach enjoying their campfire and the mild...
A few friends sitting around a bonfire on Ocean Beach has long been a San Francisco tradition, but starting one of those fires could soon require more than a piece of paper for kindling — it could require one bearing a permit. Hanging out at Ocean Beach enjoying their campfire and the mild weather, left to right, Academy of Art students Ren Kaws, 21, Rosemary Xue, 21, Lisa Wang, 20, Stella Yang, 19, and Daniel Chang 19 on October 18, 2015. Hanging out at Ocean Beach enjoying their campfire and the mild...
A few friends sitting around a bonfire on Ocean Beach has long been a San Francisco tradition, but starting one of those fires could soon require more than a piece of paper for kindling — it could require one bearing a permit.
